author: Zak Cheney-Rice
title: Who ‘Deserves’ Jail During a Pandemic?
description: The Cook County Jail in Chicago is America’s biggest coronavirus hotspot. Why did we allow this?
content: The Cook County Jail in southwest Chicago is Americas biggest known source of coronavirus infections. There are bigger metropolitan epicenters to be sure, like New York City; there are places where COVID-19 death rates are higher, like New Orleans and Detroit… [+6716 chars]
